about_page.title: About El Eman
about_page.subtitle: Where Belief Takes Shape - A Success Story Built on Trust and Quality

story_content.title: Built on Belief
story_content.paragraph1: El Eman Developments was founded on the firm conviction that true construction begins with belief. Since our inception, we believe that every project we build is more than just a property - it's a home that embraces dreams and a community that brings hearts together.
story_content.paragraph2: Our journey began with a clear vision: to be the leaders in Egypt's real estate industry by developing projects that combine world-class quality with authentic Egyptian identity. We don't just build, we shape the future of urban communities in Egypt.
story_content.paragraph3: Every stone we lay, every design we create, and every green space we plant carries within it our deep belief in every Egyptian family's right to have a home worthy of their dreams and aspirations.

vision_content.title: Our Vision for the Future
vision_content.description: To be the leading real estate development company in Egypt and the Middle East, known for excellence in design, commitment to quality, and community responsibility.

mission_content.title: Our Mission
mission_content.description: We strive to develop integrated urban communities that combine modernity with authenticity, providing a healthy and sustainable living environment for our clients, while maintaining the highest standards of quality and transparency.

belief.description: We believe in our ability to achieve the impossible and build our clients' dreams

ceo.name: Ahmed El Eman
ceo.title: Chief Executive Officer
ceo.bio: With over 20 years of experience in the real estate development industry, Ahmed El Eman leads the company towards achieving its vision of being the leader in the Egyptian market.

coo.name: Fatma Mohamed
coo.title: Chief Operating Officer
coo.bio: An architectural engineer with 15 years of experience, she oversees all development phases and ensures the application of the highest quality standards in projects.

cfo.name: Mohamed Ali
cfo.title: Chief Financial Officer
cfo.bio: A financial expert with 18 years of experience in the real estate sector, he manages the company's financial and investment strategies.

main_office.title: Main Office
main_office.address: North 90th Street, Fifth Settlement, New Cairo

visit.title: Schedule Visit
visit.description: Book an appointment to visit our offices

question1.q: How can I schedule a property viewing?
question1.a: You can schedule a visit through the form above, call us directly, or via WhatsApp. Our team will coordinate a suitable appointment for you.

question2.a: We offer various financing options including traditional and Islamic banking, and flexible payment plans from the developer.

question3.q: Can I invest in properties from abroad?
question3.a: Yes, we welcome investors from around the world and provide special services for international clients.

question4.q: How long does unit delivery take?
question4.a: Delivery periods vary by project, typically ranging from 2-4 years from construction start date.

question5.q: Are there warranties on the units?
question5.a: Yes, we provide comprehensive warranties on all units covering structure, finishes, and electrical and plumbing systems.
